name: Quick Arena
description:
This is The Binding Of Isaac: Greed Mod-inspired game where you will die with 100% probability. The only one question is how long you can resist.

This is my first game. I made it for the final project in college.
I am open to any type of criticism, if you want to leave some feedback, I will be glad to read it! The game was developed as a standalone application, but then I realized that I can publish it here, so everyone can try it without download.  So don't be surprised by exit button and local high score table :)
